name: dbt-heros
description: A curated directory of high-performance Claude Code plugins for the dbt ecosystem, including Lightdash semantic layer modeling, analysis, and administration.

plugins.name: lightdash-analysis
plugins.description: Lightdash Analysis plugin for data exploration and insight generation.

plugins.name: lightdash-content-admin
plugins.description: Lightdash Content Administration plugin for managing spaces, charts, and dashboards within a project.

plugins.name: lightdash-development
plugins.description: Lightdash Development plugin for semantic layer modeling (dbt YAML, metrics, dimensions).

plugins.name: lightdash-org-admin
plugins.description: Lightdash Organization Administration plugin for managing users, groups, and organization settings.

plugins.name: dbt-fusion-development
plugins.description: dbt Fusion Development plugin for creating and modifying dbt resources (Rust, AOT).

plugins.name: dbt-fusion-analysis
plugins.description: dbt Fusion Analysis plugin for project inspection, data preview, and semantic layer utilization.

plugins.name: dbt-fusion-ops
plugins.description: dbt Fusion Operations plugin for environment maintenance, debugging, and dependency management.

plugins.name: dbt-core-development
plugins.description: dbt Core Development plugin for creating and modifying dbt resources.

plugins.name: dbt-core-analysis
plugins.description: dbt Core Analysis plugin for project inspection, data preview, and semantic layer utilization.

plugins.name: dbt-core-ops
plugins.description: dbt Core Operations plugin for environment maintenance, debugging, and dependency management.
